features.description: Prose component uses relaxed line height and improved spacing
steps: Open packages/websites/components/shared/prose.tsx
Verify leading-relaxed is applied to prose
Verify list spacing classes are applied (prose-ul:first:mt-0, prose-li:mt-2)
Verify heading scroll margin (prose-headings:scroll-mt-20)

features.description: Link styles have semi-transparent underline and hover animation
steps: View a blog post with links
Verify links have subtle underline decoration
Hover over links and verify color transition to primary
Verify smooth transition animation (ease-out duration-100)

features.description: Inline code has precise em-based spacing
steps: View a blog post with inline code
Verify inline code has proper padding and margin
Verify code blocks retain existing styling

features.description: Headings display anchor link on hover
steps: View a blog post with headings
Hover over an h2 or h3 heading
Verify # anchor appears to the left
Click the anchor and verify URL updates with hash
Verify smooth opacity transition

features.description: External links have icon with hover animation
steps: View a blog post with external links
Verify external link icon is displayed
Hover over external link
Verify icon has subtle rotation/translate animation
View a blog post with images
Verify images have border applied
Verify images have rounded corners

features.description: Blog listing page uses responsive grid layout
steps: Navigate to /blog
Verify posts are displayed in grid layout
Resize browser to verify responsive columns (1 on mobile, 2-3 on desktop)

features.description: Blog posts support featured image in frontmatter
steps: Check content-collections.ts for image field
Add image field to a sample blog post
Verify image is displayed on blog listing page
Verify image is displayed on blog detail page

features.description: Blog detail page has improved spacing
steps: Navigate to a blog post
Verify page sections have appropriate spacing (gap-8 md:gap-10 lg:gap-12)
Verify featured image area displays when image is present

features.description: Global styles support media elements and link animations
steps: Check globals.css for prose media element styles
Verify images/videos have max-width: 100% and height: auto
Verify global link underline-offset and decoration styles
